description.Broken: This mod has been reported as Broken on this game version.
description.Damaged: This mod has been reported as Damaged on this game version.
description.Works: This mod has been reported as Works on this game version.

description-ea.Broken: This mod has been reported as Broken on Early Access.
description-ea.Damaged: This mod has been reported as Damaged on Early Access.
description-ea.Works: This mod has been reported as Works on Early Access.

description-exp.Broken: This mod has been reported as Broken on Experimental.
description-exp.Damaged: This mod has been reported as Damaged on Experimental.
description-exp.Works: This mod has been reported as Works on Experimental.

compatibility.no-compatibility-reported: No compatibility information has been reported for this mod yet. Try it out and contact us on the Discord so it can be updated!

help-using-mods.0: Seems wrong? Click the button below and send the generated zip file on the

launch-button.confirm-launch: Are you sure you want to launch?
launch-button.game-running: Your game launcher is reporting that the game is already running (or still in the process of closing)
launch-button.incompatible-mods-warn: {n} incompatible mods which will either not load or crash your game
launch-button.not-capable-to-launch: The Mod Manager is not capable of launching this install type, but it will still manage the mod files for you. Launch Satisfactory using your usual game launcher.
launch-button.operation-in-progress: An operation is already in progress.
launch-button.operation-queued: Changes have not yet been made to your mod files. Click the button above to apply the changes you have queued.
launch-button.possibly-compatible-warn: {n} mods that are likely incompatible with your game
launch-button.ready-note: Note: The Mod Manager has already finished installing the mod files for you. You could launch the game using your usual game launcher and mods would still be loaded.
launch-button.reported-broken-warn: {n} mods that are reported as Broken on this game version. Read the mods' description or compatibility notes for more information.
launch-button.reported-damaged-warn: {n} mods that are reported as Damaged on this game version. Read the mods' description or compatibility notes for more information.

install-status.invalid: Status: SMM cannot manage this install
install-status.unknown: Status: Could not get information about this install

mod-item.add-to-favorites: Click to add this mod to your Favorites.
mod-item.add-to-favorites-note: Having a mod Favorited is unrelated to whether or not it's installed - it's a way to keep track of a mod for later regardless of what Profile you have selected.
mod-item.cant-install-mod: You can't install this mod. Reason:
mod-item.click-to-disable: This mod is Enabled on this profile. Click to Disable it, which prevents it from loading when you start the game, but still keeps it a part of this profile.
mod-item.click-to-enable: This mod is Disabled on this profile. Click to Enable it.
mod-item.disabled-message: This mod is Disabled. Click the pause icon to Enable it.
mod-item.fulldesc-offline-mode: Offline mode is enabled. Changelogs and descriptions are not available.
mod-item.mod-is-dependency: This mod is installed a dependency of another mod. It cannot be installed or removed on its own.
mod-item.mod-is-hidden: This mod was hidden by the author.
mod-item.mod-is-missing: This mod is no longer available on ficsit.app. You may want to remove it.

queued.disable: This mod is queued to be Disabled. Click to cancel the operation.
queued.enable: This mod is queued to be Enabled. Click to cancel the operation.
queued.install: This mod is queued to be installed. Click to cancel the operation.
queued.operation: This mod is already queued for another operation.
queued.uninstall: This mod is queued to be uninstalled. Click to cancel the operation.

mod-item.remove-from-favorites: This mod is Favorited. Click to remove it from your favorites.
mod-item.try-to-install-mod: There are problems reported with this mod, but you can try to install it anyways. Details:
mod-item.uninstall-mod: This mod is installed on this profile. Click to uninstall it.
mod-item.wait-for-operation: Wait for the current operation to complete.

offline-mode.health-check-announcement: Could not reach ficsit.app. Check your internet connection or consider using the offline mode. (Mod Manager Settings > Go Offline)
offline-mode.offline-announcement: You are currently offline. Some features may be unavailable. (To reconnect, use Mod Manager Settings > Go Online)

profile-modal.profile-from-newer: This profile was created with a newer version of the game. It may not be compatible with this version.

message.Checking for mods that are no longer nee: Checking for mods that are no longer needed
message.Finding the best version to install: Finding the best version to install

server-manager.failed-to-connect-server: Failed to connect to server, click to retry

new-server.advanced-note: Note that you might have to escape certain characters in the username and password
